languages.text:
"Дважды впустую метнулся призрачный волк,
Третий бросок же его смерти был обещаньем.

"Twice the ghostly wolf came lunging,
and when a third time he leapt,
it was the promise of his death.
languages.original_text:
"Дважды впустую метнулся призрачный волк,
Третий бросок же его смерти был обещаньем.

traits.locale_text:
"Twice the ghostly wolf came lunging,
and when a third time he leapt,
it was the promise of his death.

"Twice the ghostly wolf came lunging,
and when a third time he leapt,
it was the promise of his death.

"Дважды впустую метнулся призрачный волк,
Третий бросок же его смерти был обещаньем.

"Twice the ghostly wolf came lunging,
and when a third time he leapt,
it was the promise of his death.

languages.text:
亡霊のような狼は二度も突進した
そして三度目に跳んだとき
彼の死が約束された」
languages.original_text:
"Twice the ghostly wolf came lunging,
and when a third time he leapt,
it was the promise of his death.

traits.locale_text:
亡霊のような狼は二度も突進した
そして三度目に跳んだとき
彼の死が約束された」

languages.text:
“鬼魅一般的狼曾向他扑来两次，
他的第三次跃起，
就已注定他的死期。”
languages.original_text:
"Twice the ghostly wolf came lunging,
and when a third time he leapt,
it was the promise of his death.

traits.locale_text:
“鬼魅一般的狼曾向他扑来两次，
他的第三次跃起，
就已注定他的死期。”

languages.text:
« Par deux fois le loup attaqua,
et le troisième bond qu'il fit
fut celui qui lui coûta la vie. »
languages.original_text:
"Twice the ghostly wolf came lunging,
and when a third time he leapt,
it was the promise of his death.

traits.locale_text:
« Par deux fois le loup attaqua,
et le troisième bond qu'il fit
fut celui qui lui coûta la vie. »

languages.text:
«Dos veces se abalanzó el lobo fantasmal,
y cuando lo intentó por vez tercera
firmó su propia condena».
languages.original_text:
"Twice the ghostly wolf came lunging,
and when a third time he leapt,
it was the promise of his death.

traits.locale_text:
«Dos veces se abalanzó el lobo fantasmal,
y cuando lo intentó por vez tercera
firmó su propia condena».

languages.text:
"Zweimal kam Gespensterwolf angesprungen,
und als er ein drittes Mal ansetzte,
war sein Tod besiegelt.
languages.original_text:
"Twice the ghostly wolf came lunging,
and when a third time he leapt,
it was the promise of his death.

traits.locale_text:
"Zweimal kam Gespensterwolf angesprungen,
und als er ein drittes Mal ansetzte,
war sein Tod besiegelt.

languages.text:
"Ürkütücü kurt atıldı iki kez,
üçüncü saldırısı ise
ölümün yeminiydi.

and when a third time he leapt,
it was the promise of his death.
